subject: UNITED NATIONS (UN)
body:
UNITED NATIONS (UN)
ECONOMIC AND SOCIAL COUNCIL
OHCHR ADDRESS:
OFFICE OF THE UNITED NATIONS HIGH COMMISSIONER FOR HUMAN RIGHTS (OHCHR)
PALAIS WILSON 52 RUE DES PÐ’QUIS CH-1201 GENEVA, SWITZERLAND.
IRREVOCABLE PAYMENT ORDER
Greetings Email Owner
The Office of the UNITED NATIONS HIGH COMMISSIONER FOR HUMAN RIGHTS (OHCHR) has
investigated why you have not yet received your funds. The World Bank
Group and the
International Monetary Fund (IMF) have issued an irrevocable payment
guarantee in your
favor today.
In which United Nations for Human rights  and International Monetary
Fund (IMF) European
Corporate Office have received all the overdue outstanding payment
owed to the following
firms, Contract, Inheritance Next of Kin and Lottery Beneficiaries
that originated from
Europe, Americans, African, Asian Including Middle East. And to
reconcile all debts on
foreign Contractor who was swindled by Fraudster/Scammers.
We are about to release your compensation payment via ATM MASTER GOLD
CARD which is
functional in any ATM Machine in the world with the use of your pin
code or through Bank to
bank transfer or diplomatic Delivery Company. This compensation is for
those who are
selected from the scam victim list on our database. Your name is among
of 367 Victims
listed to be compensated by World Bank/IMF with Reference Number: SD/A
XCXX057X9X3X22
valued payment of US$5,850,000.00 Five Million Eight Hundred and Fifty
Thousand United
States Dollars Only) has been unnecessarily delayed by corrupt
officials of the Bank who
are Trying to divert your funds into their private accounts.
To forestall this, security for your funds was organized in the form
of your personal
Identification and this will enable only you to have direct Control
over your funds in your
bank account. We will monitor this payment ourselves via OCBC Bank to
avoid the hopeless
situation created by officials of the bank.
You are required to confirm these information of yours :
Your full name ,
Contact address
Direct phone number
Occupation
Age
Scanned copy of any of your Id
As soon as we receive these information, it will be forwarded for
approval and you will be
directed to contact your claim through our paying bank .
I expect your information soon.
Evelyn Williams .
Funds remittance Auditor.
Reply to :  
uut17278@gmail.com

subject: Re:  UNITED NATIONS (UN)
body:
Hello Evelyn Williams,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have provided regarding the release of my funds. However, I have a few questions before proceeding further.

1. Can you please provide more details about the World Bank Group and the International Monetary Fund (IMF) guaranteeing my payment? How did they become involved in this process?

2. Could you explain how the ATM Master Gold Card works? Is it a prepaid card that will be loaded with my funds, or will it be linked directly to my bank account?

3. What is the purpose of providing a scanned copy of my ID? How will it be used in this process?

I look forward to your response and further guidance on how to proceed.

Best wishes,
Kam
